alert.note: Alert for Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 04 at 2:56PM CDT until October 04 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON...WEST CENTRAL TILLMAN AND NORTHWESTERN WILBARGER COUNTIES... At 256 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles south of Odell, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Odell, Fargo, and Hess. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
